thread.title: Pawan Kalyan currently shooting item song with Laxmi Rai
thread.title_full: Pawan Kalyan currently shooting item song with Laxmi Rai - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Pawan Kalyan currently shooting item song with Laxmi Rai
text: It is a known fact that Pawan Kalyan recently joined the shoot of Sardaar Gabbar Singh. The Latest update is that the unit is currently shooting a raunchy item song. A huge set has been laid at the Ramanaidu Studios in Nanakram Guda in Hyderabad. The hot and vivacious Laxmi Rai will be seen shaking a leg with Pawan in this peppy number composed by Devi Sri Prasad. Directed by Bobby, this film has Kajal Agarwal as the female lead and Kabir Singh of Jil fame is playing the negative lead.
